content:
@Julian Berman @Arthur Paulino

I want to introduce CI to make it easier to notice disruptive changes when the metapro API changes due to future Lean updates.
In order to introduce CI, I changed the intentional errors in the code examples so that they do not become errors.

https://github.com/leanprover-community/lean4-metaprogramming-book/pull/131

Could you please review this?
Asei Inoue has marked this topic as resolved.
